topic.title: Merged mining (namecoins) with Antminer
topic.body:
Do anyone has experience with it?
How to install any packages to antminer system?

P.S. S7 model

1_1A2Enr1q8vQEuZdJjGDiENzmYb3cypxjAN.body:
thank you!
have found one pool http://mmpool.org/main will try it.

Do you have any information about firmware change? I would like to install some software (vpn) to allow remote control via ssh
